The “Sleepers” were intended as the eventual targets of Psychotronic ''Triggering'' launched by the Zeta-Dracos-Anunnaki Fallen Angelic collectives if their OWO Master Plan progressed beyond 2002. The GA did not stress the “Sleepers” as being the primary threat to planetary security; the greatest threat was the intention of the Fallen Angelic forces to trigger Wars between Nations. In 1999-early 2000, the Illuminati Sleeper groups were not intended as the force that would start the ''WW3'' drama; the Fallen Angelics simply intended to use them after the fact of major global war , as covert militia operatives. The GA intended to warn the public of any known Sleeper activity if that ''time ever came.''
